verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הָרְבִיעִ֔ת <S%H7243><s%> And it came to pass in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> came הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> [that] this word הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְךָ֮ מְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> thee a roll סֵפֶר֒ <S%H5612><s%> of a book וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <S%H3789><s%> and write אֵלֶ֗יהָ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֞ים <S%H1697><s%> therein all the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֧רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> that I have spoken אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> unto thee against Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and concerning יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and against Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> and against all the nations מִיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> from the day דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I spake אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you מִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> unto thee from the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah וְעַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> will hear בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> It may be that the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I חֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> which I purpose לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לָהֶ֑ם לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> order יָשׁ֗וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> unto them that they may return אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וְסָלַחְתִּ֥י <S%H5545><s%> that I may forgive לַעֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity וּלְחַטָּאתָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> and their sin ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Then Jeremiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵֽרִיָּ֑ה <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote בָּר֜וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> and Baruch מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> from the mouth יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֧י <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> which he had spoken אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> about עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מְגִלַּת־ <S%H4039><s%> unto him upon a roll סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> of a book

וַיְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> And Jeremiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> Baruch לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am עָצ֔וּר <S%H6113><s%> I [am] shut up לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> I cannot לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> go בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וּבָאתָ֣ <S%H935><s%> Therefore go אַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> you וְקָרָ֣אתָ <S%H7121><s%> thou and read בַמְּגִלָּ֣ה <S%H4039><s%> in the roll אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which כָּתַֽבְתָּ־ <S%H3789><s%> which thou hast written מִפִּי֩ <S%H6310><s%> from my mouth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> the words יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD'S בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day צ֑וֹם <S%H6685><s%> upon the fasting וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> and also בְּאָזְנֵ֧י <S%H241><s%> them in the ears כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of all Judah הַבָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> that come out מֵעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> of their cities תִּקְרָאֵֽם׃ <S%H7121><s%> and also thou shalt read

אוּלַ֞י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps תִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> It may be they will present תְּחִנָּתָם֙ <S%H8467><s%> their supplication לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְיָשֻׁ֕בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and will return אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one מִדַּרְכּ֣וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> from his evil כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for great הָאַף֙ <S%H639><s%> [is] the anger וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> and the fury אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath pronounced יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> against this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did בָּרוּךְ֙ <S%H1263><s%> And Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵ֣רִיָּ֔ה <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> according to all that Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet לִקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> him reading בַסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהֹוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD'S ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become בַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַ֠חֲמִשִׁית <S%H2549><s%> And it came to pass in the fifth לִיהוֹיָקִ֨ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֤הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַתְּשִׁעִ֔י <S%H8671><s%> in the ninth קָרְא֨וּ <S%H7121><s%> [that] they proclaimed צ֜וֹם <S%H6685><s%> a fast לִפְנֵ֧י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> to all the people בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people הַבָּאִ֛ים <S%H935><s%> that came מֵעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> from the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> Then read בָר֥וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> Baruch בַּסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּלִשְׁכַּ֡ת <S%H3957><s%> in the chamber גְּמַרְיָהוּ֩ <S%H1587><s%> of Gemariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֨ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֜ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe בֶּחָצֵ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> court הָעֶלְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> in the higher פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entry שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S הֶֽחָדָ֔שׁ <S%H2319><s%> of the new בְּאָזְנֵ֖י <S%H241><s%> in the ears כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of all the people

וַ֠יִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> had heard מִכָ֨יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> When Michaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גְּמַרְיָ֧הוּ <S%H1587><s%> of Gemariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַסֵּֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> out of the book

וַיֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> Then he went down בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> into the king's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <S%H3957><s%> chamber הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> into the scribe's וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> and lo all the princes יֽוֹשְׁבִ֑ים <S%H3427><s%> sat אֱלִישָׁמָ֣ע <S%H476><s%> there [even] Elishama הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וּדְלָיָ֣הוּ <S%H1806><s%> and Delaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שְׁ֠מַעְיָהוּ <S%H8098><s%> of Shemaiah וְאֶלְנָתָ֨ן <S%H494><s%> and Elnathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַכְבּ֜וֹר <S%H5907><s%> of Achbor וּגְמַרְיָ֧הוּ <S%H1587><s%> and Gemariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֛ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan וְצִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <S%H6667><s%> and Zedekiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲנַנְיָ֖הוּ <S%H2608><s%> of Hananiah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַשָּׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> and all the princes

וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> declared לָהֶם֙ מִכָ֔יְהוּ <S%H4321><s%> Then Michaiah אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> unto them all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he שָׁמֵ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> that he had heard בִּקְרֹ֥א <S%H7121><s%> read בָר֛וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> when Baruch בַּסֵּ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the book בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַשָּׂרִ֜ים <S%H8269><s%> Therefore all the princes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בָּר֗וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> unto Baruch אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדִ֡י <S%H3065><s%> Jehudi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְ֠תַנְיָהוּ <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שֶׁלֶמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H8018><s%> of Shelemiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כּוּשִׁי֮ <S%H3570><s%> of Cushi לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying הַמְּגִלָּ֗ה <S%H4039><s%> the roll אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which קָרָ֤אתָ <S%H7121><s%> wherein thou hast read בָּהּ֙ בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people קָחֶ֥נָּה <S%H3947><s%> Take בְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand וָלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and come וַ֠יִּקַּח <S%H3947><s%> took בָּר֨וּךְ <S%H1263><s%> So Baruch בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נֵרִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H5374><s%> of Neriah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּגִלָּה֙ <S%H4039><s%> the roll בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about
